00026 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 int ltc1663_SendCommand( const char * device ,
00061                          unsigned char command , 
00062                          unsigned int value )
00063 {
00064   knet_dev_t * dev;
00065   int rc;
00066 
00067   if ((dev = knet_open( device , 
00068                         KNET_BUS_ANY , 0 , NULL )) == NULL )
00069     return 0;
00070   
00071   knet_set_order( dev , KNET_ORDER_LITTLE );
00072 
00073   if ((rc=knet_write16( dev , command , value & ((1<<10)-1) )) < 0 )
00074     return rc;
00075 
00076   knet_close( dev );
00077 
00078   return 1;
00079 }
